summary: This is a USMS Prisoner Schedule Report for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, dated August 8, 2019, detailing prisoner movements and court appearances scheduled for August 9, 2019. It lists multiple inmates with their details, court destinations, and special cautions, but does not specifically mention Jeffrey Epstein or any individuals directly related to his case.

locations: 40 Foley (likely 40 Foley Square, a federal courthouse in Manhattan)
keyFacts: This document is a routine prisoner movement schedule for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York for August 9, 2019.
It lists numerous inmates by identification number, but no names of inmates are provided, only their ID numbers, charges, and assigned judges.
The document includes detailed special cautions for inmates, such as medical concerns (asthma, methadone), security concerns (gang affiliation, assaults on staff), and separation warnings.
Jeffrey Epstein, who was an inmate at MCC New York and died on August 10, 2019, is not listed or referenced in this schedule for August 9, 2019.
The document is administrative, showing the standard operations of the USMS and BOP in managing prisoner court appearances.
